name: Doggo Knight
description:
This is the story of a peaceful kingdom, where life was simple and happy, until one day the darkness came!  The sky darkened and a huge tower rose from the ground. Many tried to launch an assault on the tower, but nobody has ever come back... But in hopes of bringing the light back to the kingdom, a young city guard decides
to go to the tower...

This is my first game, I started it to learn some code and familiarize myself with the Godot engine. For a first game, I maybe aimed a little too high but I learned a lot of things! I hope you like this little zelda-like!

Control:

You can play with your keyboard or with a controller, but you can only change the controls for the keyboard...

  • Z Q S D for moving
  • E action/sword
  • R guard
  • A consumable
  • F use equipment
  • 1 2 3 switch equipment
  • ECHAP for pause/map
Devs:

Programming and art : Sieg

Sound design : Robin Fréville

OST !
